name: Maekong
description:
#What is MKC (Maekong coin?): Meakong coin or MKC token is a token created on the BEP-20 network, this token is based on a real estate project. And has the purpose to facilitate the conduct of business.
	#Who Are the Founders of Maekong Plaza?: Maekong plaza was founded by Mr.Jarad Vongtaveekiat. He is the CEO of a real estate company. and saw a way to bring crypto to join the real estate business
	#How many Maekong coin(MKC) Tokens are thewe in circulation?: THere is a maximum supply of 400 million MKC. There was a circulating supply of about 70% of 280 million MKC.
